content.title: Incentive Award For Marriage With Disabled Person
content.department: Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur
content.beneficiary: Persons marrying a Person with Disability
content.details: 'Incentive Award for Marriage with Disabled Person' is a Grant by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur. In this scheme, incentive is granted to a person who marries a Person with Disability. This is a State Sponsored Scheme and only the citizens who are domicile of the State of Manipur can apply to this scheme. The marriage should take place in Manipur and both the husband and wife should be living together at the time of applying this scheme. Also, the marriage should be registered with the Registrar of Marriage. The application should be submitted through the respective District Social Welfare Officer.
benefits: ₹ 15,000/- in the case of a girl marries a young man with a disability.
₹ 20,000/- in the case of a young man marries a girl with a disability.
₹ 35,000/- in the case a girl with a disability marries a young man with a disability.
eligibility: The applicant should be a domicile of the state of Manipur.
The applicant should be of legal marriage age.

The applicant should be marrying a Person with a Disability of legal marriage age. The age of the girl in the couple should not be less than 18 years and not more than 45 years at the time of marriage.
The percentage of disability should be 40% and above.
The applicant should not be an income taxpayer.
The marriage should take place in Manipur and both the husband and wife should be living together at the time of applying this scheme.
The marriage should be registered with the Registrar of Marriage.
content.application_process: Offline. The application form can be downloaded from the Department’s website www.socialwelfare.nic.in or collected from the District Social Welfare Offices, Office of CDPOs. The application forms are also available during MeeyamgiNumit at Chief Minister’s Darbar Hall. Fill in the mandatory fields of the Application Form, attach the supporting (self-attested) documents and the passport sized photograph. Submit the form in the Office of the District Social Welfare Officer concerned.
documents_required: Proof of Address / Residential / Domicile Certificate
Marriage Registration Certificate issued by the Registrar of the Marriage Registration Office, Government of Manipur.
Disability Certificate issued by the competent authority.
A certificate from the concerned District Social Welfare Officer, Manipur to the effect that both the husband and wife are living together at the time of applying this scheme.
A declaration to be jointly signed by both the parties that they will not resort to separation or breakage of marriage except under legal provisions.

faqs.question: Which Department Manages The 'Incentive Award For Marriage With Disabled Person' Scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme 'Incentive Award for Marriage with Disabled Person' is managed by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur.

faqs.question: Is It A State Sponsored Scheme Or A Centrally Sponsored Scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is a State Sponsored Scheme.

faqs.question: What Is The Full Form Of PwD?
faqs.answer: The full form of PwD is 'Person with Disability'.

faqs.question: Can A Person Who Is Domicile Of Assam Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only the citizens who are domicile of the State of Manipur can apply to this scheme.

faqs.question: Is It Mandatory For The Marriage To Have Taken Place In Manipur In Order To Be Eligible To Apply?
faqs.answer: Yes, the marriage should take place in Manipur and both the husband and wife should be living together at the time of applying this scheme.

faqs.question: How Much Shall Be The Amount Of Incentive If A Girl Marries A Young Man With A Disability?
faqs.answer: The amount of incentive shall be ₹ 15,000/- in the case a girl marries a young man with a disability.

faqs.question: How Much Shall Be The Amount Of Incentive If A Girl Marries A Young Man With A Disability?
faqs.answer: The amount of incentive shall be ₹ 20,000/- in the case a girl marries a young man with a disability.

faqs.question: How Much Shall Be The Amount Of Incentive If A Girl With A Disability Marries A Young Man With A Disability?
faqs.answer: The amount of incentive shall be ₹ 35,000/- in the case a girl with a disability marries a young man with a disability.

faqs.question: Will The Incentive Be Paid In Installments Or As A Lump Sum?
faqs.answer: The incentive will be paid as a lump sum.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accepts Online Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts offline applications.
